data.name: MusicTitle
data.value: Music

data.name: MusicVolume
data.value: Volume:

data.name: Tutorial10KemronHailing
data.value: This is Captain Kemron from the Federation starship Vortex. You are trespassing in a private Federation sector. Identify yourself!

data.name: Tutorial11PlayerRespondKemron1
data.value: I am a servant of the Void. Stand aside or face annihilation.
data.comment: I am a servant of the Void. I am executing a test for the prototype Star Destroyer. Stand aside or face annihilation.

data.name: Tutorial12PlayerRespondKemron2
data.value: My navigation program is experiencing problems. I will leave this sector immediately.

data.name: Tutorial13PlayerRespondKemron3
data.value: Prepare for extermination! [Attack]

data.name: Tutorial14PlayerRespondKemron4
data.value: [Ignore]

data.name: Tutorial15KemronRespond1
data.value: All hands - battle stations! Servant of the Void you are surrounded and outnumbered. Lower your shields and prepare to be boarded. This is your last warning.

data.name: Tutorial16KemronRespond2
data.value: Make sure it does not happen again! Your ship signature has been broadcast to all other ships in this sector. If you enter again without permission, we will fire immediately. Goodbye.

data.name: Tutorial17KemronRespond3
data.value: All hands - battle stations! [Attack]

data.name: Tutorial18KemronRespond4
data.value: Captain Kemron hailing unidentified ship. This is your last warning. Identify yourself, or we will disable your ship.
data.comment: [The player has the same options again, and if he ignores them, they will attack him]

data.name: Tutorial19Stun
data.value: Use #color{255,255,0}Q#defalutColor{} to stun your enemies. The stun system takes a long time to recharge. Its remaining cooldown is displayed on the bottom right corner.
data.comment: Your second battle support system allows you to stun enemy ships around you for a few seconds. The stun range is limited, so you will need to be close to the enemy ships. The stun system takes a long time to recharge (15 seconds), so use it wisely. The recharge counter of the stun system is displayed on the bottom right corner. The next time you encounter an enemy ship, Use W to try it.

data.name: Tutorial1Awaken
data.value: Hyper jump completed successfully. Initialize briefing protocol. Test prototype star destroyer. Do not engage other ships unless hostile activity detected. Commence test. (Press space to contiune)

data.name: Tutorial20DestroySunVoice
data.value: Star destroyer charge complete. #color{255,255,0}Annihilate Sun#defalutColor{}.

data.name: Tutorial21DestroySunExplanation
data.value: Click #color{255,255,0}1#defalutColor{} to fire star destroyer

data.name: Tutorial2Mouse
data.value: Use #ctext{255,255,0,"mouse"} wheel to zoom in and out. Use #ctext{255,255,0,"WASD"} to move.
data.comment: Use mouse wheel to zoom in and out. Use the mouse to turn your ship. Use WASD to move.

data.name: Tutorial3Zoom
data.value: Use mouse wheel to zoom in and out.

data.name: Tutorial4Guns
data.value: Use left and right mouse buttons to fire the ship guns.

data.name: Tutorial5Minerals
data.value: Most asteroids will provide minerals that you can gather. Minerals are required to upgrade and customize you ship with new weapons, items and ammo. Be carefull when destroing red asteroids, they can explode. Your ship is fully equipped, you don't need to gather any minerals now.

data.name: Tutorial6Speed
data.value: Click E to activate speed boost.
data.comment: Your ship is equipped with special battle support systems. Your first system allows you to use shadow speed for short period. Use E to try it.

data.name: Tutorial8PhoenixDevice
data.value: Your ship is equipped with a Phoenix Device. It will be activated automatically when your ship is destroyed. It will also stun nearby enemies for a few seconds, and push them back.

data.name: Tutorial9MoveToSun
data.value: Follow the arrow until you reach the sun. The star destroyer will be activated when you are near the sun and not in battle.
data.comment: Servant of the Void, you are ready to test the star destroyer. Follow the arrow until you reach the sun. The star destroyer will be activated when you are near the sun and not in battle.
